entities.name: harry

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as overhearing Harry and correcting him with 'Or herself'.

entities.name: prince
entities.description: The Prince is the author of the book 'Advanced Potion-Making' and has made additional notes throughout the book.

relationships.description: Harry had skimmed through the book 'Advanced Potion-Making' written by the Prince.
Hermione overheard Harry and corrected him with 'Or herself'.
